input.description: XML document conforming to the ConnectionDetails Concept that contains the information required to execute a command via command line
Displays the Removable Storage name for the media. Valid value: true
Displays the media status (for example, Healthy, Read only, and so on)
Displays the media capacity in gigabytes (GB). Valid value: true
Displays the amount of free space on the media in gigabytes. Valid value: true
Displays the most recent update date for the media. Valid value: true
Displays the number of existing copies for the media and each copy's status. Valid value: true

output.description: XML document consisting of one or more <line> elements that contain the command response. Each <line> element contains an index attribute indicating the order in which the information was returned by the command.
Did the operation succeed? Valid values: true

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <fat-command> <command os-id="Linux"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">echo Command not supported on Linux.</xsl:text> </command> <command os-id="SunOS"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">echo Command not supported on SunOS.</xsl:text> </command> <command os-id="Windows Default"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">rss media show </xsl:text> <xsl:if test="string-length('${media name}') !=0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[media name] </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${name}') !=0 and '${name}' ='true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">/name </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${status}') !=0 and '${status}' ='true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">/status </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${capacity}') !=0 and '${capacity}' ='true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">/capacity </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${free space}') !=0 and '${free space}' ='true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">/freespace </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${version}') !=0 and '${version}' ='true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">/version </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${copies}') !=0 and '${copies}' ='true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">/copies </xsl:text> </xsl:if> </command> <command os-id="Windows XP"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">echo Command not supported on Windows XP.</xsl:text> </command> </fat-command> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Perform RSS Show Media Display information about specified media.
